resources.string: DroidFeed is created to provide a curated list of Android development related media.
You can find your bookmarked articles here!

We created DroidFeed to help Android Developers to stay informed about the latest news, thoughts and ideas.

We would love to have your help to make this app better. We'd super appreciate it if you let us know

* other Android Development article sources
* what you like/not like about the app
* any features you want to see
* bugs you've encountered
* any visual designers who can bringing this app's design to another level
* anything else you'd like us to know

Say hi to us by clicking the button below. We can't wait to hear from you!

- Dogan & Anyi
